languages.text: {n}Криво ухмыльнувшись, мутант выхватывает инъектор.{/n} "О-о-о, боевой стимулятор! Знал{mf||а} бы ты, какие с него видения! Можно, конечно, от такого и сдохнуть... но это того стоит!"
{n}With a crooked smirk, the mutant grabs the injector.{/n} "Oooh, a combat stimulant! The things you see when you use it! It might kill you, sure... but it's worth it!"
languages.original_text: {n}Криво ухмыльнувшись, мутант выхватывает инъектор.{/n} "О-о-о, боевой стимулятор! Знал{mf||а} бы ты, какие с него видения! Можно, конечно, от такого и сдохнуть... но это того стоит!"

traits.locale_text: {n}With a crooked smirk, the mutant grabs the injector.{/n} "Oooh, a combat stimulant! The things you see when you use it! It might kill you, sure... but it's worth it!"
traits.speaker: TrampMain

traits.locale_text: {n}With a crooked smirk, the mutant hands you his weapon and grabs the injector.{/n} "Oooh, a combat stimulant! The things you see when you use it! It might kill you, sure... but it's worth it!"
traits.speaker: TrampMain

traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}変異体は不敵な笑みを浮かべながら、注射器を手に取った。{/n}「おおっ、戦闘用の増強剤か！使ってみりゃ分かるぜ！確かに死ぬかもしれないが…それだけの価値はある！」
languages.original_text: {n}With a crooked smirk, the mutant grabs the injector.{/n} "Oooh, a combat stimulant! The things you see when you use it! It might kill you, sure... but it's worth it!"

traits.locale_text: {n}変異体は不敵な笑みを浮かべながら、注射器を手に取った。{/n}「おおっ、戦闘用の増強剤か！使ってみりゃ分かるぜ！確かに死ぬかもしれないが…それだけの価値はある！」
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}变种人带着扭曲的微笑，一把抓住了注射器。{/n}“噢噢噢，是战斗兴奋剂！这可是好东西啊！它说不定会要了你的命……但这也值了！”
languages.original_text: {n}With a crooked smirk, the mutant grabs the injector.{/n} "Oooh, a combat stimulant! The things you see when you use it! It might kill you, sure... but it's worth it!"

traits.locale_text: {n}变种人带着扭曲的微笑，一把抓住了注射器。{/n}“噢噢噢，是战斗兴奋剂！这可是好东西啊！它说不定会要了你的命……但这也值了！”
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}El mutante agarra el inyector con una sonrisa torcida.{/n} «¡Oooh, un estimulante de combate! ¡Las cosas que ves cuando lo usas! Puede matarte... ¡pero vale la pena!».
languages.original_text: {n}With a crooked smirk, the mutant grabs the injector.{/n} "Oooh, a combat stimulant! The things you see when you use it! It might kill you, sure... but it's worth it!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El mutante agarra el inyector con una sonrisa torcida.{/n} «¡Oooh, un estimulante de combate! ¡Las cosas que ves cuando lo usas! Puede matarte... ¡pero vale la pena!».
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}Mit einem schiefen Grinsen greift der Mutant nach dem Injektor.{/n} "Ooh, ein Kampfstimulans! Was man durch das Zeug für Dinge sieht! Bringt einen zwar um, gut ... aber das ist es wert!"
languages.original_text: {n}With a crooked smirk, the mutant grabs the injector.{/n} "Oooh, a combat stimulant! The things you see when you use it! It might kill you, sure... but it's worth it!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit einem schiefen Grinsen greift der Mutant nach dem Injektor.{/n} "Ooh, ein Kampfstimulans! Was man durch das Zeug für Dinge sieht! Bringt einen zwar um, gut ... aber das ist es wert!"
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}Le mutant s'empare de l'injecteur, un sourire aux lèvres.{/n} « Oooh, un stimulant de combat ! Oh là là, ce qu'on peut voir quand on en prend... ! Pour sûr, ça peut vous tuer, mais ça vaut largement le coup ! »
languages.original_text: {n}With a crooked smirk, the mutant grabs the injector.{/n} "Oooh, a combat stimulant! The things you see when you use it! It might kill you, sure... but it's worth it!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le mutant s'empare de l'injecteur, un sourire aux lèvres.{/n} « Oooh, un stimulant de combat ! Oh là là, ce qu'on peut voir quand on en prend... ! Pour sûr, ça peut vous tuer, mais ça vaut largement le coup ! »
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}Mutant, çarpık bir gülümsemeyle şırıngayı alıyor.{/n} "Vay anam, çatışma uyarıcısı hem de! Bunu kullanınca bambaşka bir dünyaya ışınlanıyorsun! Ölüm riski olsa da değer be!"
languages.original_text: {n}With a crooked smirk, the mutant grabs the injector.{/n} "Oooh, a combat stimulant! The things you see when you use it! It might kill you, sure... but it's worth it!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Mutant, çarpık bir gülümsemeyle şırıngayı alıyor.{/n} "Oooh, çatışma uyarıcısı hem de! Bunu kullanınca bambaşka bir dünyaya ışınlanıyorsun! Ölüm riski taşıyor tabii ama değer be!"
traits.speaker: TrampMain
